projects.name: GGSIPU-College Management
projects.desc: I have developed this complete School Management System using the MERN stack. It includes features like student management, teacher modules, attendance tracking, event management, and circular updates. This project helps streamline school operations and improves communication between students, teachers, and administrators.

difficulties.desc: I faced challenges while managing user authentication and role-based access control, but I overcame them by studying official documentation and community tutorials.

learn.desc: Through this project, I learned how to build a complete full-stack application, handle backend APIs securely, connect frontend and backend efficiently, and manage complex database schemas.

projects.name: GGSIPU-College Dispensary System
projects.desc: I am currently developing a College Dispensary Management System using the MERN stack. This system will help manage student medical records, appointment scheduling, medicine inventory, and health reports. The project is still a work in progress, and I am actively working on building a user-friendly interface and robust backend APIs.

difficulties.desc: Since the project is in progress, I am facing challenges mainly in designing an efficient database schema for medical records and implementing secure authentication for doctors and students.

learn.desc: This project is helping me deepen my understanding of backend architecture, database design, secure API integration, and frontend development with React.
